text: Perinton (originally Perrinton (in federal censuses) and sometimes PerringtonManual for the Use of the Assembly compiled by Aaron Clark (1816; page 173) when still part of Ontario County) is a town in Monroe County, New York, United States. About 47,479 people lived here since the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Towns in New York (state)
title: Perinton, New York
